reviewText: This is the second copy I've purchased.  My son wore-out the first copy.

Both "Black Diamond Railway" part one and part two are among the very best model railroad videos I have ever seen.  The cinematography and narration of the highly detailed and scenicked railway is absolutely first rate.
Want to add to your knowledge of layout construction or just sit back and enjoy a tour of a great railway ?  Either way, these DVDs of the "Black Diamond Railway" are your ticket to railroad themed enjoyment.
Watch these DVDs and you will join me in saying, "When will we see more of the "Black Diamond Railway".
